description.brief: A YAML Parsing library for C++

package.description:
yaml-cpp is a YAML parser and emitter in C++ written around the YAML 1.2 spec. It's based on (but not a wrapper to) the C library libyaml.
This is version 0.2.2 of yaml-cpp. We plan to track the latest release assuming backwards compatability.
package.author: Jesse Beder
